nodes.text: An outreach temple was a temple that the Jedi Order established as the headquarters of their outreach program. It was also where the inhabitants of a location could go for spiritual and emotional support.

One outreach temple was established on the planet Mathas, where it was initially occupied by the head of the Mathas outreach program, the Jedi Kez Velaz. Following his disappearance, Drooz took over the temple and established himself as the self-proclaimed Jedi Master of Mathas. As a result, the Order dispatched Cyslin Myr and her Padawan, Mace Windu to capture Drooz.
